Colombia: President Manuel Antonio Sanclemente extended the deadline for completion of the Panama Canal from 31 October 1904 to 31 October 1910. The executive decree was granted without consent of the Colombian Congress.
Date of death of Salvador Camacho, called the "founder of sociology" in Colombia.
José Manuel Marroquín is president of Colombia
Naturalist Soto Grimshaw dies of cholera during an expedition to the Caribbean Region of Colombia
